languages.text: "Нет. Лучше уйти". {n}Вопреки своим словам, Соломон не двигается с места. Вы чувствуете, что каждая мышца в его руке сведена.{/n}
"No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет. Лучше уйти". {n}Вопреки своим словам, Соломон не двигается с места. Вы чувствуете, что каждая мышца в его руке сведена.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}
"No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}
"No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}
"No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}
"No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}

languages.text: « Je regrette, mais il vaut mieux que je parte, » {n}répond-il, sans toutefois essayer de s'en aller. Vous sentez tous les muscles de son bras se tendre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je regrette, mais il vaut mieux que je parte, » {n}répond-il, sans toutefois essayer de s'en aller. Vous sentez tous les muscles de son bras se tendre.{/n}

languages.text: 「いえ。やはり私は戻った方がいい」{n}そう言いながらも、ソロモーンは微動だにしなかった。彼の腕の筋肉がすべて緊張でこわばっていくのを感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いえ。やはり私は戻った方がいい」{n}そう言いながらも、ソロモーンは微動だにしなかった。彼の腕の筋肉がすべて緊張でこわばっていくのを感じる。{/n}

languages.text: «No, será mejor que me vaya». {n}Pese a sus palabras, Solomorne no se mueve. Sientes que los músculos de su brazo se tensan.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No, será mejor que me vaya». {n}Pese a sus palabras, Solomorne no se mueve. Sientes que los músculos de su brazo se tensan.{/n}

languages.text: “不，我还是走比较好。”{n}尽管索罗蒙这么说，但他并没有动。你感觉到，他胳膊上的每块肌肉都绷紧了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不，我还是走比较好。”{n}尽管索罗蒙这么说，但他并没有动。你感觉到，他胳膊上的每块肌肉都绷紧了。{/n}

languages.text: "Olmaz. Gitmem gerek." {n}Bu dediğinin aksine yerinden kıpırdamıyor. Kol kaslarının gerildiğini hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Olmaz. Gitmem gerek." {n}Aksine Solomorne yerinden kıpırdamıyor. Kol kaslarının gerildiğini hissediyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: "Nein. Es ist besser, wenn ich gehe." Trotz seiner Worte bewegt sich Solomorne nicht. Du spürst, dass jeder Muskel seines Arms angespannt ist.
languages.original_text: "No. It's better if I go." {n}Contrary to his words, Solomorne does not move. You feel every muscle in his arm go taut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Es ist besser, wenn ich gehe." Trotz seiner Worte bewegt sich Solomorne nicht. Du spürst, dass jeder Muskel seines Arms angespannt ist.
